page.title: 04ST MARYS CHURCH,COWBIT
page.content: Our priest uses 20 wafers in a service and he uses 750 wafers in a year and 6 bottles of wine.There are 4 altar cloths and their colours are green which is used for all the Sundays of the year,red which is for the day of the gift of the Holy Spirit,purple is used for Advent,Lent and funerals.White is used at Christmas and Easter. Our priest visits 3 other churches and visits 4 schools as he is the vicar of Cowbit,Weston Hills,Weston and Moulton Chapel. Father Hadley has one service a week and four every sunday.In a year there is an average of 8 funerals and 1 wedding at Cowbit Church. The church has 6 cleaners a month to clean the Church out. Last year our church celebrated its 600th anniversary.
